name: Stock Reconciliation troubleshoot
query:
SELECT 
    sr.posting_date AS "Posting Date:Date:", 
    sr.posting_time AS "Posting Time:Time:",
    GROUP_CONCAT(sr.name SEPARATOR ', ') AS "Stock Reconciliations:Link/Stock Reconciliation:",
    sri.item_code AS "Item:Link/Item:",
    sri.warehouse AS "Warehouse::",
    sri.item_name AS "Item Name::",
    GROUP_CONCAT(FORMAT(sri.qty, 0)) AS "Qty Values:Data:",
    SUM(sri.amount_difference) AS "Total Amount Difference:Currency:"
FROM 
    `tabStock Reconciliation Item` sri
INNER JOIN 
    `tabStock Reconciliation` sr ON sri.parent = sr.name
WHERE 
    sr.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY 
   sri.warehouse, sri.item_code
HAVING 
    COUNT(*) > 1;
